Embross self service solutions help airlines and airports deliver seamless self check in, bag drop and transit experiences to millions of travellers every year. With a global deployment of more than 23,000 kiosks across the world's leading airports and airlines, Embross continues to set the standard for innovation, reliability and passenger experience.
